name: Roadkill (itch)
description:
Ranked #8 out of 784 games in the #indiesvspewdiepie game jam.

A game about absurd city-planning, anarchic pedestrians and casual murder.

* Game may or may not contain moderate cartoon violence and suggested nudity

Roadkill was made by Shawn Beck for #indiesvspewdiepie game jam.
Vote for it here: http://bit.ly/1uRnRC

Follow me on Twitter : @shawnbecktp

SPECIAL THANKS

Roadkill is free to play!

Thanks for playing =D
